author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Year of the Crab Update Release Date Trailer for Another Crab's Treasure, an action soulslike game developed by Aggro Crab Games. Players will gain access to a suite of new content for the hit soulslike game including more Crabs, Costumes, New Game Plus, a Boss Rush mode, and more for players to enjoy. The Year of the Crab Update for Another Crab's Treasure is launching on April 21 for PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC with a release on Nintendo Switch soon.

#AnotherCrabsTreasure #Gaming #IGN
title: Another Crab's Treasure - Official Year of the Crab Update Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Ezra, a once-famous trumpeter, now struggles to keep his career afloat, performing for scraps at the local small jazz club. After his family is killed in a horrific car crash, Ezra stumbles upon a lighthouse and is mistaken for the keeper by one of the workers. Drawn by the power of the lighthouse, he decides to stay, living as a recluse. Soon, however, he encounters a suicidal visitor, Sam, and finds solace in his presence, gaining the resolve to help the lost souls that stumble upon the lighthouse. As days pass, Ezra meets Hannah, a beautiful, enigmatic teacher who imbues his life with meaning and potential newfound happiness. But Sam, feeling excluded and threatened, becomes unreasonably jealous, leading to an inevitable clash that forces each character to confront their deepest selves, testing the limits of isolation and redemption in Ezra's secluded new world.

#I'mBeginningToSeeTheLight #Movies #IGN
title: I'm Beginning to See the Light - Official Trailer (2025) Jack Huston, Abbie Cornish

author: IGN
description:
Tears of Metal is a medieval hack-and-slash co-op roguelike game. Fight your way through hordes of enemies to reclaim your island with the help of your powerful Scottish battalion. As you venture deeper into the trenches, you will uncover more about the mysterious Dragon Meteor and the treacherous enemy invasion.
The Open Beta for Tears of Metal is available now and will run from April 10th to April 17th.

#TearsOfMetal #Gaming #IGN
title: Tears of Metal - Official Open Beta Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Launch Trailer for Backrooms Cleanup Crew, a multiplayer cleaning simulation game developed by On The Bridge Games. Players will team up with their crew to clean up the aftermath of other corporations’ mishaps in the Backrooms. Dodge deadly anomalies across a plethora of rooms to ensure each room is cleaned to perfection. Backrooms Cleanup Crew is available now for PC (Steam).

#BackroomsCleanupCrew #Gaming #IGN
title: Backrooms Cleanup Crew - Official Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
After quitting her dead-end job, Fiona starts over on a farm and becomes the immortal herald of a dead god. Make friends, fight through horrors, and pay your debt in Neverway, a nightmarish life sim RPG. 
Visit Steam and add Neverway to your wishlist now!

#Neverway #Gaming #IGN
title: Neverway - Official Reveal Trailer | The Triple-i Initiative Showcase 2025

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the 'The Unfettered Destruction' Teaser Trailer #2 for Project Pantheon, a free-to-play hack-and-slash action RPG developed by Wolcen Studio. Players will fight with deep hack-and-slash combat across a dark fantasy world in PvPvE engagements. Push back against Death who has assumed control of Civilization after the gods fell. Project Pantheon is coming soon to PC (Steam).

#ProjectPantheon #Gaming #IGN
title: Project Pantheon - Official 'The Unfettered Destruction' Teaser Trailer #2

author: IGN
title: Fortnite recreated the Adventure Time intro in the game! #fortnite #adventuretime #itemshop #trailer

author: IGN
description:
Learn about your arsenal in Abyssus in this new trailer for the upcoming co-operative brinepunk first-person shooter game. Abyssus will be available on PC via Steam in 2025. A demo for Abyssus is available now on Steam.

In Abyssus, Brinehunters are sent to scour the ocean floor to investigate a powerful electromagnetic source, a journey leading the crew to an ancient, sunken city. Explore the ruins of this forgotten civilization to discover its secrets while fighting through corrupted hordes of enemies with weapons made of ancient tech that deliver responsive feedback, making each shot feel precise and impactful.

#Abyssus #Gaming #IGN
title: Abyssus - Official Deep Dive Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Early Access Launch Trailer for Driveloop: Survivors, a driving roguelike shooter developed by Stunbyte. Players will shoot and ram waves of steampunk enemies in a desert wasteland. Upgrade powerful weapons, bring new crew members to the fold, and survive intense battles full of chaos. Driveloop: Survivors is available now in Steam Early Access for PC.

#DriveloopSurvivors #Gaming #IGN
title: Driveloop: Survivors - Official Early Access Launch Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at gameplay from Frozen Ship in this trailer for the upcoming survival, narrative-driven adventure that blends first-person open-world exploration with the management of a city on wheels. Manage your team, build structures, make tough decisions, explore, craft - everything is in your hands. Frozen Ship will be available in Early Access on PC in August 2025.

Welcome to the snow-covered wastelands of a once-thriving world. You will lead an expedition to find a place suitable for establishing a settlement. At your disposal is a crew of 20 people and a ship - a machine capable of covering vast distances while carrying everything necessary for a long journey.

#FrozenShip #Gaming #IGN
title: Frozen Ship - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
In this South of Midnight full game walkthrough, we take you through every chapter of South of Midnight, an action-adventure game by Compulsion Games. For more on South of Midnight, head to IGN for our full guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/south-of-midnight

00:00:00 Chapter One: Night of the Flood
00:25:23 Chapter Two: Other Voices, Other Looms
00:43:12 Chapter Three: A Big Fish
01:24:00 Chapter Four: Wicked Temper
01:33:42 Chapter Five: Everything That Rises
02:28:56 Chapter Six: Hush, Hush, Sweet Cherie
03:04:45 Chapter Seven: A Barman Is Hard To Find
03:55:04 Chapter Eight: Their Eyes Were Watching
04:05:35 Chapter Nine: Of Webs And Women
05:06:16 Chapter Ten: Light In The Darkness
05:30:15 Chapter Eleven: Muddy Waters
05:59:37 Chapter Twelve: The Crossroads
06:28:47 Chapter Thirteen: Past Isn’t Past
06:59:00 Chapter Fourteen: Midnight

#IGN #Gaming
title: South of Midnight Full Gameplay Walkthrough

author: IGN
description:
Check out this latest clip from Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts, the latest film installment in the Marvel Cinematic Universe distributed by Marvel Studios. Yelena wrestles and contemplates this dark emptiness she admits has been growing within her being. She starts to consider its deep ramifications to only come to terms with the feelings not being as serious as she once thought. Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts releases in theaters on May 2.

In Thunderbolts, Marvel Studios assembles an unconventional team of antiheroes—Yelena Belova, Bucky Barnes, Red Guardian, Ghost, Taskmaster and John Walker. After finding themselves ensnared in a death trap set by Valentina Allegra de Fontaine, these disillusioned castoffs must embark on a dangerous mission that will force them to confront the darkest corners of their pasts. Will this dysfunctional group tear themselves apart, or find redemption and unite as something much more before it’s too late?

Jake Schreier directs Thunderbolts and Kevin Feige
title: Marvel Studios' Thunderbolts - Official 'Something Wrong' Official Clip (2025) Florence Pugh

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Space Adventure Cobra: The Awakening trailer for this upcoming video game adaptation of the iconic animated series produced by TMS, which itself is based on the beloved manga by Buichi Terasawa. Space Adventure Cobra: The Awakening will be available on PS5 (PlayStation 5), Xbox Series X|S, Nintendo Switch, and PC on August 26, 2025.

Play as Cobra, the space pirate, in an action platformer adapted from the famous anime series. Along with Lady Armaroid, your loyal partner, and equipped with your iconic Psychogun, you must solve a mysterious threat hanging over the entire universe.

#SpaceAdventureCobraTheAwakening #Gameplay #IGN
title: Space Adventure Cobra: The Awakening - Official Gameplay Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Take a look at the Gameplay Release Date Trailer for Rise of Rebellion, a third-person action-adventure RPG developed by Hytacka. Players will harness Tel Energy from the depths of the Earth to dispatch enemies with engaging melee combat across a plethora of battlefields. Maintain energy levels while draining opponents' stamina during battle, and land a punishing blow on lowered defenses in a heart-pounding, tactical combat adventure. Rise of Rebellion is launching on April 22 for PC (Steam).

#RiseOfRebellion #Gaming #IGN
title: Rise of Rebellion - Official Gameplay Release Date Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at Mouse Work in this reveal trailer for the upcoming party game using the Switch 2 mouse controls. In Mouse Work, team up with friends or go it alone, facing a range of minigame challenges using the Switch 2 mouse controls. Players take on the role of adorable mice that are just trying to earn some Cheddar. Fortunately for them, the local job center has a wealth of offerings available, each testing our mice with new and innovative cursor-based gameplay. Mouse Work will be available on Nintendo Switch 2.

#MouseWork #Gaming #IGN
title: Mouse Work - Official Reveal Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Here's your look at the Outside The Blocks trailer for this upcoming full-featured model builder game where you can unleash your creativity and design your own realistic 3D diorama. Shape the terrain, assemble modular houses, add decorations and put your creation on display. Outside The Blocks will be available on PC (via Steam), and a demo is out now on Steam.

#OutsideTheBlocks #Gaming #IGN
title: Outside The Blocks - Official Demo Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Watch the Full Release Date Trailer for Synergy, an ecosystem city-builder developed by Leikir Studio. Players will build a settlement, manage workers, and optimize resources for prosperity's sake. Synergy is launching on April 16 for PC (Steam, GoG, and Epic Games Store).

#Synergy #Gaming #IGN
title: Synergy - Official Full Release Date Trailer
